artist: Painter: After Gabrielle Perelle; Printer: P. Ferdinand; Engraver: Cornelis Danckerts I
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

a.) in plate in black: G. Perelle in. et fecit   Ianuier  A Paris Chez P. Ferdinand au Faubourg / St. Germain Rue de Seine a la Bergerie / Auvec Privilege du Roy | on sheet in pencil: 2-184

b.) in plate in black: i or 1 in URC; C. Dankerts fec.er.exc.   Perelle inventer  cum Privelegio  | on sheet in pencil: 2-184
title: a) January; b)
